{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SOHOware |model=AeroGuard |revision=AAP1000 |asin= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/20/2004 |fcc_id=RZ9AEROGUARD, NKREM500AG |pcb_id=52-0000514-00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb EM-500AG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5212A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5111A |wi1_chip3_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip3_model=AR2111A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0B:6B |oui_eth=00:0B:6B }} :[http://sohoware.com/support/pdf/brch-AeroGuard_Family.pdf ''AeroGuard Family'' Product brief]
The FCC manual indicates.. *This device runs Linux by default (kernel 2.4.14). :To reset the device to factory defaults, :hold the 'Restore' button for two seconds.
*"MAC ID: 000B6B301730" and "EM-500AG (CM6)" is printed on a :label affixed to the wireless module. :"52-0000514-00 Rev A" is silkscreened on the serial port board.
